creator: taylor.wickens@fedex.com
text:
Note: This seems to be a problem with Apache 1.3. Apache 2.0 works fine. Since 
we are using 1.3 here in production, I need it to work for 1.3.

I have a servlet that sets a cookie to the response header and is then 
immediately forwarded using the request dispatcher. If I access the website 
directly, it works. If I access it through the proxy (proxypass and 
proxypassreverse) the cookie is never set. 

Also note: If I comment out the redirect and just let the servlet display some 
html, the cookie will be set.

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
There were some cookie bugs fixed after .24 was released.

  Please upgrade to 1.3.26, reopen if the behavior persists.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
No further response. Assuming issue resolved.

Please reopen the bug if this is not the case and/or you can provide additional
information.

Thanks for using Apache.
